title: Please rework Annie's passive!!!
body:
- Make it so she can't hold on to her passive forever, stun times out in 10 seconds

- Passive has to only reach 3 stacks now

- Now has to all in to get a stun

it could work
gives counterplay and doesn't nerf as much

Remember, Annie can't move very fast. if she saunter's up to you don't be a fool just move away.

This change would only really hurt Annie support. Solo lane Annie wouldn't care too much.

I think the best way to make it so she has to all in is make it so the further away she is the less time it stuns for, q stun spam is now not annoying yet if she flashes in or ambushes she can still blow cunts up.
